body_html: We finally got this change merged! Thanks for the patience. We needed to change if_cuda_is_configured in tf_cuda_library back to if_cuda to get some internal targets to pass. Feel free to send another PR if this causes any issue and we can work out a patch.
body_text: We finally got this change merged! Thanks for the patience. We needed to change if_cuda_is_configured in tf_cuda_library back to if_cuda to get some internal targets to pass. Feel free to send another PR if this causes any issue and we can work out a patch.
body: We finally got this change merged! Thanks for the patience. We needed to change if_cuda_is_configured in tf_cuda_library back to if_cuda to get some internal targets to pass. Feel free to send another PR if this causes any issue and we can work out a patch.
